alert.note: Alert for Lower Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:08PM AKST until December 25 at 10:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Lower Kuskokwim Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The initial precipitation will fall as snow, but will begin to mix with or change to freezing rain as warmer air at and above the surface advances from the west. Expect freezing rain and snow to switch over to all rain from west to east as temperatures continue to warm to above freezing by late Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
